name: Annoying Rollers - Meet Your Mecha
description:
A simple, strategic fighting game where you pilot Mechas and switch states to attack your enemies vulnerability.

You play as up and coming rookie Mecha pilots who have entered the “Mech.Life Tournament”. Run by the Mech.Life company whose “innovative Mechas provide the best in private defence”. The Mech.Life Tournament is a global competition which pits the best Mecha pilots against each other to determine the new face of the Mech.Life company. Punch, Kick and Shoot your way through your rivals to make it to the top, or “Meet your Mecha” at the hands of your opponent!

To do damage to your opponent you must attack them with the opposite attack colour than the colour state they are in e.g: Attack with red punches if your opponent is in the blue state. The colour of your projectile will be whatever colour state you are in e.g: If you are red you will shoot red projectiles.

Controls:

(Controller Supported)

Player 1 Keyboard:

W = Jump

A = Left

D = Right

C = Punch

V = Kick

B = shoot

Player 1 Controller:

Bottom Button = Jump

Analog stick left = Left

Analog stick right = Right

Left Button = Kick

Right Button = Shoot

Top Button = Punch

Player 2 Keyboard:

Arrow key up = Jump

Arrow key left = Left

Arrow key right = Right

I = Punch

O = Kick

P  = Shoot

Player 2 Controller:

Bottom Button = Jump

Analog stick left = Left

Analog stick right = Right

Top Button = Punch

Left Button = Kick

Right Button = Shoot

A game made in under 2 weeks for the University of Portsmouth Technical Demo 3 Game Jam.
